Html:
Hi,

I am very new to this subject and was reading the documentation and was try out a very small integration project.

I am trying to integrate an ASP.NET based legacy application but don't know how to do it. I tried some google and available documentation and howto's but wasn't successful in finding the solution. Can some one help me on this. One thing is that I can't change anything to the legacy application as it was been built by another vendor.

My utlimate aim to create a composite UI which consists of this Legacy Application and new PRISM 2.2 based Search application in one UI.

Any help is appriciated.

Thanks

Prateek

Prateek,

Are you thinking of doing this integration in a dekstop application?
